department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: The goal of this course is to develop the ability to solve problems in practice through modeling via commercial software ARENA.
goal.ch: 本實習課程之目的，旨在提供同學商業模擬軟體ARENA實地操作的機會。 透過軟體的操作培養學生建立模擬模型解決實務問題之能力。

textbook.en: "Kelton, W. D. , Sadowski, R. P. , and Sturrock, D. T. Simulation with Arena, 4th edition. McGraw-Hill."
textbook.ch: "Kelton, W. D. , Sadowski, R. P. , and Sturrock, D. T. Simulation with Arena, 4th edition. McGraw-Hill."

flex_desc.en: Additional course material will be assigned for students during the last two weeks of the semester.
flex_desc.ch: Additional course material will be assigned for students during the last two weeks of the semester.

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Conjoint CoursesIA7032 only.
ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。指定課程:必須同修(含先修)IA7032。
